name: Flakasoft
tag_list: software-development, apple-ios, iphone, android, android-development, iphone-development, mobile-development, qa, software-testing
overview:
Software development studio that specializes in high-quality mobile and web projects. They have produced a number of well received applications on both the Apple App Store and Google Play market. They provide end-to-end solutions that include mobile development, web-services to support the application, and consumer facing websites to promote the company or application.

This end to end solution includes, ideation, planning, wire-framing, design, implementation and QA testing.

Their language specialties include but are not limited to Ruby on Rails, Objective-C (iOS), Java, C++, PHP, Django, ASP .Net, C#, and all the usual web scripting suspects like HTML, XML, XHTML. They also provide advanced web technologies like adaptive design based on HTML5 and CSS 3.
